title: Galvanic lithotrophy, a new path to fuel bioelectrochemical processes
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00186A, Paper
Carlos Norberto Rodríguez Simón, Pablo Sebastian Bonanni, Juan Pablo Busalmen
Galvanic coupling with a biocompatible conductive material can make accesible unexplored electron sources for bacteria.
